import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{useLanguage}from'../../../lib/language-context';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MiniTreeVisual=_ref=>{let{growthStage,progress}=_ref;const{t}=useLanguage();// Ê†ëÊú®emojiÂàóË°®ÔºåÂØπÂ∫î‰∏çÂêåÁîüÈïøÈò∂ÊÆµ

];return colors[growthStage];};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative w-12 h-12 flex items-center justify-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`absolute inset-0 rounded-full ${getBackgroundColor()} flex items-center justify-center`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.span,{initial:{scale:0.5,opacity:0},animate:{scale:1,opacity:1},className:"text-2xl",children:treeEmojis[growthStage]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("svg",{className:"absolute inset-0",viewBox:"0 0 36 36",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("circle",{cx:"18",cy:"18",r:"16",fill:"none",stroke:"#e5e7eb",strokeWidth:"3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.circle,{initial:{strokeDashoffset:100},animate:{strokeDashoffset:100-progress},cx:"18",cy:"18",r:"16",fill:"none",stroke:growthStage<3?"#22c55e":"#10b981",strokeWidth:"3",strokeDasharray:"100",strokeLinecap:"round",transform:"rotate(-90 18 18)"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute left-0 -top-8 opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity w-max pointer-events-none",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white text-xs px-2 py-1 rounded border shadow-sm text-gray-700",children:[stageNames[growthStage]," (",progress,"%)"]})})]});};export default MiniTreeVisual;
